products.name: Chocolate Fudge Fixation

products.name: Passion Fruit Rum Sundae
products.description: Diced pineapple pieces infused with Dead Man's Fingers Raspberry Rum, with passion fruit sorbet, crushed meringue, pineapple puree and whipped cream. Topped with candyfloss, waffle cone and served with two shots of Prosecco.

products.name: Cookie Bits S'mores Sundae
products.description: Vanilla ice cream covered with banana, Oreo pieces, chocolate buttons and topped with whipped cream, waffle cone and drizzled with chocolate sauce.
